channel.title: Npcdrops- [pi]
channel.description:
wow? i didnt know my question was that hardd =/ ive looked on google, + everything.. but everyones stuck??
how would i make it to where something drops everytime, but rare'r items dont? like ashes 100%/ and 3%claws or something?? Some people say top row = common, bottom = rare and other say its the opposite? which one? this is a [pi] under NPCdrops.TSM .. + this is what i hear below
#Lesser Demon <-----name 82:30 995:1300 15039:1 15040:1 <-- idk
[NPC ID] : [rarity] --tab-- [item id] : [item quantity] --then put all the items that you want?? but its wierd cuz its an or. like if you have 2 things, its 1 or the other? and idk what bottom row is. I put a code in the bottom/compile/restart and it drops at the same rate as the top? --can someone that knows what their doing help? i know a lot of people are stuck on this =/ -thanks

item.title: Npcdrops- [pi]
item.dc:creator: @play_4_fun play 4 fun
item.description:
@play_4_fun wrote:

[quote=“I_Hybrid_I, post:2, topic:396724”]Npcdrops.tsm Post something like this

#general graardor
6260:25 829:1 391:2 385:2 564:50 1249:1 3052:3 892:75 1303:1 808:100 1602:3 1917:1 1971:1 1514:16 1319:1 1275:1 3024:3 1606:3 454:150 560:100 563:50 561:75 1373:1 1127:1 5300:2 2440:3 1604:3 1452:1 995:100000 1149:1 830:5 1079:1 886:100 1608:3
11712:1 11728:1 11714:1 11724:1 11704:1 11710:7600 (This item drops ALWAYS, If it isnt by u try 3500 or just 100 instead of 7600)[/quote]

wait so what does this stuff mean??

ok so what would it look like if i was trying to make. lets sayy steel dragons (1592) to drop d bones (536) everytime with a 10% chance of dropping visage? (11286)??

Read full topic
